words.def: The place in which something happens.
a person who hews
a unit of magnetic flux equal to 100,000,000 maxwells
a plant lacking a permanent woody stem
A Jew.
drink made by steeping and boiling and fermenting rather than distilling
have the quality of being
the present location
an open vessel with a handle and a spout for pouring
The eyelid.
a general name for alcoholic beverages made by fermenting a cereal (or mixture of cereals) flavored with hops
make or shape as with an axe
an intricate network suggesting something that was formed by weaving or interweaving
a short time
a member of a people living in southern Benin and Togo and southeastern Ghana
`Johnny' was applied as a nickname for Confederate soldiers by the Federal soldiers in the American Civil War
any of numerous hairy-bodied insects including social and solitary species
A state of befuddlement; intoxication.
Of bad quality.
a very light colorless element that is one of the six inert gasses
a light strong brittle grey toxic bivalent metallic element
a rare heavy polyvalent metallic element that resembles manganese chemically and is used in some alloys
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
